Articles.Content:
0.16

-Multiversal Mechatronics (The Camera)

-Damned Robotics (The Up-Down/Right-Left Function for the Camera)

-Mechanical Mouse Industries (The Pod)

 

I cannot find them anywhere.

I wasn't around for 0.16 (or its mods) but chances are those mods were on the Spaceport, which I believe took many a mod with it when it was shut down. If it wasn't saved anywhere else chances are its gone for good.

Two questions of my own:
1. Is there intended to be a gif or video in your post?
2. Just for my own curiosity, any particular reason you are looking to mod 0.16?

Well Damned Robotics was remaned into Infernal Robotics I hink, or it at least has the same features. With what FungusForge said we would need a picture.

 

Here's the camera one: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/12300-019-multiversal-mechatronics-fixed-camera-13/

Infernal Robotics: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/104535-105-magic-smoke-industries-infernal-robotics-0214/

Edited December 29, 2015 by legoclone09

I wasn't around for 0.16 (or its mods) but chances are those mods were on the Spaceport, which I believe took many a mod with it when it was shut down. If it wasn't saved anywhere else chances are its gone for good.

Two questions of my own:
1. Is there intended to be a gif or video in your post?
2. Just for my own curiosity, any particular reason you are looking to mod 0.16?

1. I don't have a gif, because i didn't find them now. I found them in the forum in the past, writed down the info and now they are gone from the forum.

2. I hang to the past.

I HAVE DAMNED ROBOTICS!!!!

Here ya go bud
